2.caption_en:
Cover of a "Platform IT Architecture" toolset from the Platform Innovation Kit, subtitled "a guide to design and implement a modern and saleable IT infrastructure for your platform business." The cover shows a bold yellow title banner, a dark circular motif with dotted pattern, and logos for fastbreak.one and AWS.

{
  "artifact_type": "guide cover",
  "title": "PLATFORM IT ARCHITECTURE",
  "series": "TOOLSET",
  "subtitle": "a guide to design and implement a modern and saleable IT infrastructure for your platform business",
  "organization": "PLATFORM INNOVATION KIT",
  "sponsors": [
    "fastbreak.one",
    "aws"
  ],
  "visual_elements": [
    "large yellow horizontal title banner",
    "dark circular motif with halftone/dotted pattern",
    "top-right Platform Innovation Kit logo",
    "background photo of people in a workshop (desaturated)"
  ],
  "dominant_colors": [
    "white",
    "mustard yellow",
    "dark teal/gray"
  ],
  "text_language": "English",
  "layout": {
    "orientation": "landscape",
    "logo_position": "top-right",
    "title_position": "center-left on yellow banner",
    "subtitle_position": "directly below title within yellow banner",
    "decorative_circle_position": "left-center"
  },
  "ocr_text": [

  ],
